name: Our Destination
description: A finely crafted weapon rack made from premium quality stone, carefully selected by the artisan who made it. Adorned with exquisite metal fittings, it is primarily used for displaying weapons, and can be found in the Temple of Pax within the Stadium of the Sacred Flame.\nIt is said that some of the weapons on the Temple of Pax's weapon wall once belonged to warriors who achieved great fame in past competitions. For these warriors, their weapons were not just companions in battle, but extensions of their very souls. And given the fiery nature of their spirits, perhaps the best place for their honor to reside is within the Stadium grounds, where their legacy endures...
